title: Tesla Inc. stock rises Monday, still underperforms market
text:
Shares of Tesla Inc. 
        TSLA,
        +5.97%
       rose 1.25% to $240.45 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        +0.51%
       rising 2.20% to 14,843.77 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.58% to 37,683.01. The stock's rise snapped a six-day losing streak. Tesla Inc. closed $58.84 short of its 52-week high ($299.29), which the company achieved on July 19th. Trading volume (84.7 M) remained 34.1 million below its 50-day average volume of 118.8 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. Trump Media & Technology Group completed a merger with a SPAC. Shares of the merged company rose 35% on Monday.
